# eva-button

## Properties

| Property  | Attribute | Description                               | Type      | Default |
| --------- | --------- | ----------------------------------------- | --------- | ------- |
| `basic`   | `basic`   | Indicate if this is a basic button        | `boolean` | `false` |
| `control` | `control` | Indicate if this is a control button      | `boolean` | `false` |
| `danger`  | `danger`  | Indicate if this is a danger button       | `boolean` | `false` |
| `giant`   | `giant`   | Indicate if this is a giant sized button  | `boolean` | `false` |
| `info`    | `info`    | Indicate if this is a info button         | `boolean` | `false` |
| `large`   | `large`   | Indicate if this is a large sized button  | `boolean` | `false` |
| `medium`  | `medium`  | Indicate if this is a medium sized button | `boolean` | `false` |
| `small`   | `small`   | Indicate if this is a small sized button  | `boolean` | `false` |
| `success` | `success` | Indicate if this is a secondary button    | `boolean` | `false` |
| `tiny`    | `tiny`    | Indicate if this is a small sized button  | `boolean` | `false` |
| `warning` | `warning` | Indicate if this is a warning button      | `boolean` | `false` |


## Shadow Parts

| Part       | Description                         |
| ---------- | ----------------------------------- |
| `"button"` | Styling applied to button container |
